channel.title: Insidia- symbol error (porbably simple)
channel.description:
hey im using an insidia source, and when i compile i get this error
src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:2364: error: cannot find symbol c2.donorPoints += point; //CHANGE THIS TO YOUR DONOR POINTS VARIABLE ^ symbol: variable donorPoints location: variable c2 of type Client src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:2387: error: cannot find symbol c2.donorPoints += point; //CHANGE THIS TO YOUR DONOR POINTS VARIABLE ^ symbol: variable donorPoints location: variable c2 of type Client src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:2410: error: cannot find symbol c2.donorPoints += point; //CHANGE THIS TO YOUR DONOR POINTS VARIABLE ^ symbol: variable donorPoints location: variable c2 of type Client Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 3 errors Press any key to continue . . .
its the '.' on c2. apparently

item.title: Insidia- symbol error (porbably simple)
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

Right you need to define donorPoints in player class

then in your command make sure your calling the c2. by looping the players

for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

is the code

hope i helped

Read full topic
